m:Text.text: Senior SAP BTP Full Stack Developer and Architect
Senior SAP BTP Full Stack Developer and Architect

m:Label.text: Guten Tag!! I am Balaji Vengatesh and I am a Senior SAP BTP Developer and Architect

m:Text.text: I am a Senior SAP BTP Full Stack Developer and Architect with 10+ years of experience in SAP ABAP, SAP UI5, SAP Fiori, SAP Cloud Platform, SAP Cloud Application Programming Model, SAP HANA, SAP BTP, SAP Cloud Integration, SAP Cloud Workflow, SAP Cloud Analytics, SAP Cloud Portal, SAP Cloud Identity, SAP Cloud Security, SAP Cloud Build, SAP Cloud Deploy, SAP Cloud Transport Management, SAP Cloud Application Lifecycle Management, SAP Cloud Monitoring, SAP Cloud Logging, SAP Cloud Alerting, SAP Cloud Service Level Agreement, SAP Cloud Service Level Objective, SAP Cloud Service Level Indicator, SAP Cloud Service Level Agreement Management, SAP Cloud Service Level Objective Management, SAP Cloud Service Level Indicator Management, SAP Cloud Service Level Agreement Monitoring, SAP Cloud Service Level Objective Monitoring, SAP Cloud Service Level Indicator Monitoring, SAP Cloud Service Level Agreement Alerting, SAP Cloud Service Level Objective Alerting, SAP Cloud Service Level Indicator Alerting
